data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
In Porto Alegre Internacional's Peglow is caught offside.
In the minute 2, Internacional have a goal kick.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Ceara.
In the minute 5, Attention is being given to Internacional’s Thiago Galhardo and play has been suspended briefly.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Internacional are pushing forward but Edenilson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Internacional's Thiago Galhardo looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Ceara.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Ceara drives forward and Cleber Bomfim gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 10, Can Ceara capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Internacional's half?
William Oliveira of Ceara gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 11, Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Ceara.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Internacional.
In the minute 12, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Peglow.
The home team has substituted Peglow with Martin Sarrafiore. Eduardo Coudet is thus making his first change.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira blows against Ceara's Cleber Bomfim for offside.
In the minute 15, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira awards the home team a throw-in.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 17, Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a Ceara throw-in in Internacional's half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Internacional.
In the minute 19, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ceara have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Ceara.
Ceara attack but Cleber Bomfim's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
In the minute 23, Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a Internacional throw-in in Ceara's half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Ceara.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
In the minute 29, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 32, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Thiago Galhardo for the home team is judged to be offside.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 35, Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira waits before resuming play because William Oliveira for Ceara is still down.
Ceara’s William Oliveira is on his feet again at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 38, Martin Sarrafiore gets his shot on target but fails to score for Internacional.
In Porto Alegre Internacional drive forward through Nonato. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 40, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a Internacional throw-in in Ceara's half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Internacional have a dangerous throw-in.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Internacional.
Thiago Galhardo returns to the field for Internacional after picking up a slight injury.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Goal! Thiago Galhardo gives Internacional a 1-0 lead in Porto Alegre.
That's a fine assist from Edenilson.
Alyson Vinicius Almeida Neves (Ceara) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 45, The match at Estadio Beira-Rio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Thiago Galhardo, who is down injured.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Free kick Ceara.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 47, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Porto Alegre Ceara attack through William Oliveira. The finish is off target, however.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira awards Internacional a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Internacional surge into the attack at Estadio Beira-Rio but Martin Sarrafiore’s header is off-target.
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Ceara to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ceara's Alyson Vinicius Almeida Neves misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Internacional's Martin Sarrafiore breaks free at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
In the minute 53, Ceara to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Martin Sarrafiore (Internacional) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Ceara defenders.
Internacional pushes forward through Edenilson, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 55, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
Gabriel Boschilia for Internacional drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
In the minute 56, Internacional are coming forward and Thiago Galhardo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Ceara at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in Ceara.
In the minute 57, Thiago Galhardo for Internacional gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a throw-in for Ceara, close to Internacional's area.
In the minute 58, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a Ceara throw-in in Internacional's half.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Internacional.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Ceara are pushing forward but Manucho's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Ceara have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a Ceara throw-in in Internacional's half.
Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira awards Internacional a goal kick.
Abel Hernandez is replacing Martin Sarrafiore for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 65, Patrick is replacing Nonato for the home team.
Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
William Oliveira is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 67, Internacional awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Internacional needs to be cautious. Ceara have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Ceara.
In the minute 71, Internacional's Gabriel Boschilia gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
Johnny (Internacional) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 72, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 72, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Rafael Sobis is on a sub for Cleber Bomfim for Ceara.
Guto Ferreira is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Vinicius Lima replacing William Oliveira.
Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 75, Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Great finish from Thiago Galhardo to give Internacional a 2-0 lead.
Throw-in Internacional.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Internacional.
Ceara drive forward but Alyson Vinicius Almeida Neves is judged offside.
In the minute 81, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
Internacional make their fourth substitution with Andres D'Alessandro replacing Thiago Galhardo.
The home team replace Gabriel Boschilia with Rodrigo Moledo.
In the minute 83, Ricardinho is on a sub for Fernando Sobral for Ceara.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
In the minute 85, Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a Ceara throw-in in Internacional's half.
Internacional's Patrick gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo Dalonso Ferreira signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 89, The away team replace Manucho with Felipe Silva.
Guto Ferreira (Ceara) is making a fifth substitution, with Rick Lima replacing Alyson Vinicius Almeida Neves.
Free kick Internacional.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
